The Science of
Working Smarter

We help companies become innovative learning organizations, where teams collaborate better, solve problems faster, and stay engaged longer.

Learn How

or Request a Demo

Corporate

Innovate more with exploration capabilities, organizational idea flow, and learn what capacities drive team success.

Did you know? One company boosted innovation by 7% with a 10% increase in exploration.

Law

Sharpen business and financial acumen, and learn what drives collaboration, negotiation and problem solving.

Did you know? One law firm writes off over $120k of annual billable hours per new Associate.

Higher-Ed

Teach competencies and practice soft skills for students to prepare for success in their careers.

Did you know? Only 11% of CEOs are confident that students are ready for the workforce.

Stay Ahead of Change

For organizations to compete today they must create a culture of learning that keeps their teams ahead of change. Fullbridge supports a learning culture, combining in-person team learning experiences based on the latest organizational science with measurable practice modules integrated into people’s work. Participants develop the behaviors, skills and strategies that drive daily innovation and problem solving.

The Future of Learning

The Answer Is Lyra

Fullbridge learning experiences are powered by our proprietary Lyra™ Technology that enables learning that is scalable—boosting the human capacities that drive value in an organization. Lyra is a technology hub that integrates learning and practice modules with data from a variety of competency measures and assessments through observer applications, sociometric data capture and personal inputs.

Lyra Technology

Our partners

What our participants say

The Fullbridge program was a dynamic way to immerse ourselves in an office setting while being able to step back and analyze mistakes for improvement.
—Participant at The College of Holy Cross
I felt that the Fullbridge Program was able to develop an impressive number of skills in a short period of time. These skills are not limited to a strict career path, but are applicable in a multitude of careers.
—Participant at Earlham College
The opportunity to dig into the language of business and develop those skills so that you are ready for the workplace is second to none. Truly amazing how I can go from no knowledge really in business or excel and in 6 short days I’m proficient in both.
—Participant at Wabash College
